title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Caprera, Italy
content:
Photo submitted by Matteo Mara, “Shot from the Candeo viewpoint on the east coast of Caprera Island, this place gives an amazing view over the island granite rocks and the northern coast of Sardinia the second biggest Island of the Mediterranean Sea. The constant sea breeze make this place lovely to reach even during the […]

author: Kristi Benedict
